abstract: In its first over the air software update, Apple on Thursday issued a software update for the iOS 5 mobile platform that rectifies a battery problem on the iPhone 4S. The software update also adds missing multitasking gestures to the first iPad, fixes a security bug in the Apple iPad 2 and solves a syncing problem with documents and iCloud.

lead_paragraph: Apple on Thursday issued a software update for its iOS 5 mobile platform that fixes a number of minor problems on the iPhone and iPad.
